Package it.polimi.ingsw.gameLogic.model.observer

Class ModelObservable

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gameLogic.model.observer.ModelObservable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Player
public class ModelObservable extends Object
This class implements the Observable-side of the paradigm. Extended by the Player class which calls these update methods in a certain way, it calls the mirrored methods on the Observer interface an so it will change the Summary (in position 0 of the observers' array) state each move. The observer is added here at the beginning of the Turn controller phase (in its constructor).
